name: StormyNoise
0:
”Alexa open Stormy Noise”
”Alexa ask Stormy Noise to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stormy noise
des:
Unleash the power of nature with Stormy Noise. Experience the raw energy of a thunderstorm from the comfort of your home—thunderclaps, pouring rain, and the occasional howl of the wind create an awe-inspiring auditory experience, perfect for those who find comfort and excitement in the force of nature.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Stormy Noise
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
